title: Neon 360 Watch Face Wear
summary: Additional set watch faces for Android Wear.
description: NEON 360 and FULL Circle is a minimalistic watch face with modern hi-tech design.We like this watch and we hope that you'll like NEON360 too.This watch face is for rectangular smartwatches such as the Samsung Gear Live and round watches such as the Moto 360.Features:- Modern hi-tech look- Battery indicator- Customizable color- Support for square (G Watch, Gear Live, ZenWatch etc.) and round (Moto 360, G Watch R etc.) displays.
descriptionHTML:
NEON 360 and FULL Circle is a minimalistic watch face with modern hi-tech design.
We like this watch and we hope that you'll like NEON360 too.

This watch face is for rectangular smartwatches such as the Samsung Gear Live and round watches such as the Moto 360.

Features:
- Modern hi-tech look
- Battery indicator
- Customizable color
- Support for square (G Watch, Gear Live, ZenWatch etc.) and round (Moto 360, G Watch R etc.) displays.
comments: Good but could be better Needs more options like brightness and battery level but when set to black makes a perfect sleeping watch because you can check the time without going blind at night
Great Looks great at night.  Keep up the good work guys.
Awesome. Needs battery meter on face though
Dsnt work I have the moto360. I open app n pick a colof n doesnt do anything. Cant get face to show on my watch. Is there another step im not doing???
recentChanges: Added support new Watch Face API
